post.author: 김형태
post.content:
That's great.

I remember the next UML Tool was very great at 2000.
It was made by small Korean company in Pusan.
It's not open source project. You can download and use it for free.

http://www.plasticsoftware.com


>
>http://argouml.tigris.org/
post.title: [re] ArgoUML - an open source UML tool
